metadata.title: Tuesday, 6th November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Agriculture and Livestock what caused the delay in the distribution of fertilizer in Chilubi District for the 2011/2012 farming season.

Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the Government will amend the University Act, 1999, to bring it in line with the current political, social and cultural developments in the country.
Minister of Finance when the Government will facilitate the establishment of a commercial bank in Mulobezi District.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 04/01: under consideration): (The Minister of Gender and Child Development). Heads 04/02, 04/03, 04/04, 04/05, 05/01, 06/01, 07/01, 07/02, 07/03, 07/04, 07/05, 07/06, 07/07, 07/08, 07/09, 07/10, 07/13, 07/14, 07/15, 07/16, 07/17, 07/18, 07/19, 07/20, 07/21, 07/22, 33/01, 33/02, 33/04, 33/05 and 33/06 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 04    -    Ministry of Gender and Child Development Head 05    -    Electoral Commission Head 06    -    Public Service Commission – Office of the President Head 07    -    Office of the Auditor-General Head 33    -    Ministry of Commerce, Trade and Industry
